idea:
Quantum Dynamics uses data-intelligence and proprietary predictive-analytical techniques to help you anticipate the future landscape, and position yourself for what’s to come tomorrow. Our forecast analytical outcomes and customized integrated ‘Command & Control’ platforms allow for dynamic situational awareness, operations management, and efficient decision making.

Whenever a critical decision needs to be made, Quantum Dynamics has a role to play:our solutions help customers to make the right decisions at the right time and act accordingly in challenging environments. The problem-sets that are ideally suited for Quantum Dynamics are the problems that apply to the global community.
name: Quantum Dynamics Data Systems

idea:
JANS Bamboo is a Company incorporated on 25th Feb 2016 to bring about a change in the way people in India perceive Bamboo which is a grass and one of the fastest renewable natural resource and help it to become a mainstream material of choice, a credible alternative to unsustainable wood which is derived from trees.

JANS vision is to replace wood in all its forms so as to prevent the cutting of trees which is major contributor to climate change

JANS mission is to create sustainable products from Bamboo that addresses the dual issues of climate change and social disparity creating value for all its stakeholders.
name: JANS BAMBOO PRODUCTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
VAV Biocos is the only company in India which is exclusively making niche cosmetic products based on nanotechnology.

The company has developed the world’s first hair nutrient made from Egg oil called EYOVA.

VAV Biocos will be  making natural and scientifically proven differentiated products for Haircare & Skincare
name: VAV Biocos Pvt Ltd

idea: On a mission to inculcate the spirit of continuous learning, we are a learning experience platform that provides infrastructure to individuals and organisations to aggregate and share all their learning in one place so they can track, assess and grow.
name: Caymus Technology Ventures ( LORE)

idea: To provide support services to the parent company
name: AgamAnalytics

idea: LitmusWorld is an enterprise SaaS platform that delivers dramatic improvements in business processes by enabling contextual conversations between businesses and their stakeholders. The platform delivers actionable insights across touchpoints to Measure, Act and Improve the overall experience, mainly, Customer Experience (CX) and Employee Experience (EX). This helps business leaders drive the customer centricity agenda through an agile approach. Over 3 years of driving business transformation across 125+ brands, we’ve built meaningful relationships between businesses and their stakeholders, that allows them to be more competitive and profitable, one touchpoint, one conversation, one relationship, at a time. To know more: https://www.litmusworld.com/https://www.litmusworld.com/
name: LITMUS WORLD MARKETING TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Easy to use app for contractors and builders
name: Kohinoor Products
